sensor_bank module¶

class sensor_bank.Sensor(name, sensor, imu, handle, id)¶

Bases: object

Class representing a sensor with the properties we want from the OpenZen-library.

get_battery_percentage()¶

Get the battery percentage.

Returns

Battery percentage of sensor, with one decimal precision.

Return type

str

set_sampling_rate(sampling_rate)¶

Sets the sampling rate.

Parameters

sampling_rate (int) – New sampling rate.

start_collect()¶

Start to stream data from sensor.

class sensor_bank.Sensor_Bank(sensor_dict={}, sampling_rate=5, sleep_time=0.05, handle_to_id={})¶

Bases: object

Class to make managing sensor properties easier.

add_sensor(name, sensor, imu)¶

Add sensor to sensor bank.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Sensor name.

  • sensor (openzen.ZenSensor) – Sensor object.

  • imu (openzen.ZenSensorComponent) – inertial measurement unit.

disconnect_sensor(name)¶

Disconnect sensor from sensor bank.

Parameters

name (str) – Sensor name

get_sensor(name)¶

Get sensor object from sensor bank.

Parameters

name (str) – Sensor name.

Returns

Sensor object if found, else None.

Return type

openzen.ZenSensor

set_all_sampling_rates(sampling_rate)¶

Set the sampling rates for all sensors connected.

Parameters

sampling_rate (int) – New sampling rate.

set_sleep_time(sleep_time)¶

Set sleep time.

Parameters

sleep_time (float) – Time wanted to sleep for when needed.
